name: token
description: Emits the card source or the tokenized version of the user's card

name: loading
description: Emits the current loading state of the component.

name: error
description: Emits whatever error the component might encounter, especially the ones from Stripe.

name: element-change
description: The change event is triggered when the Element's value changes. The event payload always contains certain keys, in addition to some Element-specific keys.

name: element-ready
description: Triggered when the Element is fully rendered and can accept element.focus calls.

name: element-focus
description: Triggered when the Element gains focus.

name: element-blur
description: Triggered when the Element loses focus.

name: element-escape
description: Triggered when the escape key is pressed within an Element.

name: element-click
description: Triggered when the Element is clicked. This event is only emmited from a paymentRequestButton Element.
